root.name: Betrayal in Antara
root.description: AvailabilityThis game is available at gog.comPC RequirementsWindows XP or Windows Vista, 1 GHz Processor (1.4 GHz recommended), 256MB RAM (512 recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), Mouse, Keyboard. Gog.com version is compatible with Vista and Windows 7 32 64 bits
